allow: Bash(for f in addReaction archiveChannel cancelScheduledMessage deleteMessage getChannelInfo getThreadMessages joinChannel leaveChannel listScheduledMessages pinMessage postInteractiveBlocks removeReaction renameChannel scheduleMessage setChannelPurpose setChannelTopic unpinMessage updateMessage)

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:***REDACTED_PASSWORD***@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT id, provider, status, created_at, expires_at, consecutive_failures, disconnect_reason FROM integrations WHERE provider IN (''gmail'', ''google-analytics'') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(for provider in airtable blackbaud dropbox facebook gumroad instagram kit linkedin notion onenote paypal shopify teams trello twitter)

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:***REDACTED_PASSWORD***@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT id, provider, status, access_token IS NOT NULL as has_token, refresh_token IS NOT NULL as has_refresh, created_at, expires_at FROM integrations WHERE provider ILIKE ''%google%calendar%'' OR provider = ''google'' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:***REDACTED_PASSWORD***@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''integrations'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:***REDACTED_PASSWORD***@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''integrations'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:***REDACTED_PASSWORD***@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT id, provider, email, account_name, created_at FROM integrations WHERE provider = ''google-sheets'' AND user_id = ''a3e3a51a-175c-4b59-ad03-227ba12a18b0'';")
Bash(then echo "✅ $provider" else echo "❌ $provider" fi else echo "⚠️  $provider" fi fi done)
